verses.verse: The word <WH1697> that came to Jeremiah <WH3414> concerning all the Jews <WH3064> which live <WH3427> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, which live <WH3427> at Migdol <WH4024>, and at Tahpanhes <WH8471>, and at Noph <WH5297>, and in the country <WH776> of Pathros <WH6624>, saying <WH559>,

Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635>, the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478>; You have seen <WH7200> all the evil <WH7451> that I have brought <WH935> upon Jerusalem <WH3389>, and upon all the cities <WH5892> of Judah <WH3063>; and <WH3117>, behold, this day they are a desolation <WH2723>, and no man dwells in it <WH3427>,

Because <WH6440> of their wickedness <WH7451> which they have committed <WH6213> to provoke me to anger <WH3707>, in that they went <WH3212> to burn incense <WH6999>, and to serve <WH5647> other <WH312> gods <WH430>, whom they knew <WH3045> not <WH1>, neither they, you, nor your fathers.

But I sent <WH7971> unto you all my servants <WH5650> the prophets <WH5030>, rising early <WH7925> and sending <WH7971> them <WH559>, saying, Oh <WH6213>, do not do this abominable <WH8441> thing <WH1697> that I hate <WH8130>.
But they listened <WH8085> not <WH5186>, nor inclined their ear <WH241> to turn <WH7725> from their wickedness <WH7451>, to burn no incense <WH6999> unto other <WH312> gods <WH430>.

Therefore my fury <WH2534> and my anger <WH639> was poured forth <WH5413>, and was kindled <WH1197> in the cities <WH5892> of Judah <WH3063> and in the streets <WH2351> of Jerusalem <WH3389>; and they are wasted <WH2723> and desolate <WH8077>, as at this day <WH3117>.

Therefore now thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH3068>, the God <WH430> of hosts <WH6635>, the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478>; Why do you commit <WH6213> this great <WH1419> evil <WH7451> against your souls <WH5315>, to cut off <WH3772> from you man <WH376> and woman <WH802>, child <WH5768> and suckling <WH3243>, out <WH8432> of Judah <WH3063>, to leave <WH3498> you none to remain <WH7611>;

In that you provoke me unto wrath <WH3707> with the works <WH4639> of your hands <WH3027>, burning incense <WH6999> unto other <WH312> gods <WH430> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, where you be gone <WH935> to live <WH1481>, that you might cut yourselves off <WH3772>, and that you might be a curse <WH7045> and a reproach <WH2781> among all the nations <WH1471> of the earth <WH776>?

Have you forgotten <WH7911> the wickedness <WH7451> of your fathers <WH1>, and the wickedness <WH7451> of the kings <WH4428> of Judah <WH3063>, and the wickedness <WH7451> of their wives <WH802>, and your own wickedness <WH7451>, and the wickedness <WH7451> of your wives <WH802>, which they have committed <WH6213> in the land <WH776> of Judah <WH3063>, and in the streets <WH2351> of Jerusalem <WH3389>?

They are not humbled <WH1792> even unto this day <WH3117>, neither have they feared <WH3372>, nor walked <WH1980> in my law <WH8451>, nor in my statutes <WH2708>, that I set <WH5414> before <WH6440> you and before <WH6440> your fathers <WH1>.

Therefore thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635>, the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478>; Behold <WH7760>, I will set my face <WH6440> against you for evil <WH7451>, and to cut off <WH3772> all Judah <WH3063>.

And I will take <WH3947> the remnant <WH7611> of Judah <WH3063>, that have set <WH7760> their faces <WH6440> to go <WH935> into the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> to live <WH1481> there <WH8552>, and they shall all be consumed, and fall <WH5307> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>; they shall even be consumed <WH8552> by the sword <WH2719> and by the famine <WH7458>: they shall die <WH4191>, from the least <WH6996> even unto the greatest <WH1419>, by the sword <WH2719> and by the famine <WH7458>: and they shall be a execration <WH423>, and a astonishment <WH8047>, and a curse <WH7045>, and a reproach <WH2781>.

For I will punish <WH6485> them that live <WH3427> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, as I have punished <WH6485> Jerusalem <WH3389>, by the sword <WH2719>, by the famine <WH7458>, and by the pestilence <WH1698>:

So that none of the remnant <WH7611> of Judah <WH3063>, which are gone <WH935> into the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> to live <WH1481> there <WH6412>, shall escape or remain <WH8300>, that they should return <WH7725> into the land <WH776> of Judah <WH3063>, to the which they have <WH5375> a desire <WH5315> to return <WH7725> to live <WH3427> there <WH7725>: for none shall return but such as shall escape <WH6405>.

Then all the men <WH582> which knew <WH3045> that their wives <WH802> had burned incense <WH6999> unto other <WH312> gods <WH430>, and all the women <WH802> that stood by <WH5975>, a great <WH1419> multitude <WH6951>, even all the people <WH5971> that lived <WH3427> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, in Pathros <WH6624>, answered <WH6030> Jeremiah <WH3414>, saying <WH559>,
As for the word <WH1697> that you have spoken <WH1696> unto us in the name <WH8034> of the Lord <WH3068>, we will not listen unto you <WH8085>.

But we will certainly <WH6213> do <WH6213> whatever thing <WH1697> goes forth <WH3318> out of our own mouth <WH6310>, to burn incense <WH6999> unto the queen <WH4446> of heaven <WH8064>, and to pour out <WH5258> drink offerings <WH5262> unto her <WH6213>, as we have done, we <WH1>, and our fathers, our kings <WH4428>, and our princes <WH8269>, in the cities <WH5892> of Judah <WH3063>, and in the streets <WH2351> of Jerusalem <WH3389>: for then had we plenty <WH7646> of food <WH3899>, and were well <WH2896>, and saw <WH7200> no evil <WH7451>.

But since we left off <WH2308> to burn incense <WH6999> to the queen <WH4446> of heaven <WH8064>, and to pour out <WH5258> drink offerings <WH5262> unto her <WH2637>, we have wanted all things <WH8552>, and have been consumed by the sword <WH2719> and by the famine <WH7458>.

And when we burned incense <WH6999> to the queen <WH4446> of heaven <WH8064>, and poured out <WH5258> drink offerings <WH5262> unto her <WH6213>, did we make her cakes <WH3561> to worship <WH6087> her <WH5258>, and pour out drink offerings <WH5262> unto her <WH1107>, without our men <WH582>?

Then Jeremiah <WH3414> said <WH559> unto all the people <WH5971>, to the men <WH1397>, and to the women <WH802>, and to all the people <WH5971> which had given him that answer <WH1697>, saying <WH559>,

The incense <WH7002> that you burned <WH6999> in the cities <WH5892> of Judah <WH3063>, and in the streets <WH2351> of Jerusalem <WH3389>, you <WH1>, and your fathers, your kings <WH4428>, and your princes <WH8269>, and the people <WH5971> of the land <WH776>, did not the Lord <WH3068> remember <WH2142> them <WH5927>, and came it not into his mind <WH3820>?

So that the Lord <WH3068> could <WH3201> no longer carry <WH5375>, because <WH6440> of the evil <WH7455> of your doings <WH4611>, and because <WH6440> of the abominations <WH8441> which you have committed <WH6213>; therefore is your land <WH776> a desolation <WH2723>, and a astonishment <WH8047>, and a curse <WH7045>, without an inhabitant <WH3427>, as at this day <WH3117>.

Because <WH6440> you have burned incense <WH6999>, and because you have sinned <WH2398> against the Lord <WH3068>, and have not obeyed <WH8085> the voice <WH6963> of the Lord <WH3068>, nor walked <WH1980> in his law <WH8451>, nor in his statutes <WH2708>, nor in his testimonies <WH5715>; therefore this evil <WH7451> is happened <WH7122> unto you <WH3117>, as at this day.

Moreover Jeremiah <WH3414> said <WH559> unto all the people <WH5971>, and to all the women <WH802>, Hear <WH8085> the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068>, all Judah <WH3063> that are in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>:

Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635>, the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478>, saying <WH559>; You and your wives <WH802> have both spoken <WH1696> with your mouths <WH6310>, and fulfilled <WH4390> with your hand <WH3027>, saying <WH559>, We will surely <WH6213> perform <WH6213> our vows <WH5088> that we have vowed <WH5087>, to burn incense <WH6999> to the queen <WH4446> of heaven <WH8064>, and to pour out <WH5258> drink offerings <WH5262> unto her <WH6965>: you will surely accomplish <WH6965> your vows <WH5088>, and surely <WH6213> perform <WH6213> your vows <WH5088>.

Therefore hear <WH8085> you the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068>, all Judah <WH3063> that live <WH3427> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>; Behold <WH7650>, I have sworn by my great <WH1419> name <WH8034>, says <WH559> the Lord <WH3068>, that my name <WH8034> shall no more be named <WH7121> in the mouth <WH6310> of any man <WH376> of Judah <WH3063> in all the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, saying <WH559>, The Lord <WH136> God <WH3069> lives <WH2416>.

Behold <WH8245>, I will watch over them for evil <WH7451>, and not for good <WH2896>: and all the men <WH376> of Judah <WH3063> that are in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> shall be consumed <WH8552> by the sword <WH2719> and by the famine <WH7458>, until there be a end of them <WH3615>.

Yet a small <WH4962> number <WH4557> that escape <WH6412> the sword <WH2719> shall return out <WH7725> of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> into the land <WH776> of Judah <WH3063>, and all the remnant <WH7611> of Judah <WH3063>, that are gone <WH935> into the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> to live <WH1481> there <WH3045>, shall know whose words <WH1697> shall stand <WH6965>, mine, or theirs.

And this shall be a sign <WH226> unto you <WH5002>, says the Lord <WH3068>, that I will punish <WH6485> you in this place <WH4725>, that you may know <WH3045> that my words <WH1697> shall surely <WH6965> stand <WH6965> against you for evil <WH7451>:

Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH3068>; Behold <WH5414>, I will give Pharaoh <WH6548>–hophra king <WH4428> of Egypt <WH4714> into the hand <WH3027> of his enemies <WH341>, and into the hand <WH3027> of them that seek <WH1245> his life <WH5315>; as I gave <WH5414> Zedekiah <WH6667> king <WH4428> of Judah <WH3063> into the hand <WH3027> of Nebuchadrezzar <WH5019> king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894>, his enemy <WH341>, and that sought <WH1245> his life <WH5315>.
